sentences.cn: ...一个不疼不痒、不明不白的答复。

sentences.en: 'Billy, I think it's your turn to wash the dishes,'said Jane. A noncommittal grunt was his only reply.
sentences.cn: “ 比利, 我想这次该轮到你刷盘子了, ” 简说. 他只是不置可否地咕哝了一声算作回答.

sentences.en: But noncommittal is what we're all about.
sentences.cn: 可我们要的就是不承担义务.
他闪闪烁烁,不肯说明确.

sentences.en: His face was the color of a freshly baked pork pie and as noncommittal ( Thomas Pynchon )
sentences.cn: 他的脸色象刚刚烤过的猪肉饼,而且表情暖昧 ( 托马斯平琼 )

sentences.en: His mouth now full of bread, Harry shrugged and gave a noncommittal jerk of the head.
sentences.cn: 哈利嘴里又塞满了面包, 只好耸耸肩膀,不置可否地甩了一下脑袋.

sentences.en: I asked him to vote for me but he was noncommittal.
sentences.cn: 我请他投我一票,可是他仍模?两可的.

sentences.en: In addition, between the two extremities of for - eignizaton and domestication, equalization forms a noncommittal translation strategy.
sentences.cn: 另外, 异化与归化只构成翻译策略的两极, 其中间地带是等化翻译.

sentences.en: Mr. Hall is non-committal about the number of jobs that the development corporation has created.
sentences.cn: 霍尔先生对开发公司已创造的岗位数量含糊其词。

sentences.en: The developer of the price cuts, the industry has become increasingly recognized from the noncommittal up.
sentences.cn: 对于开发商的降价行动, 业内也从不置可否变得愈加认可起来.

sentences.en: The voice on the radio was suave and noncommittal.
sentences.cn: 收音机里的声音温和而平静.

sentences.en: The White House spokesman noncommittal on this question.
sentences.cn: “白宫”发言人对这个问题不置可否.

sentences.en: The White House spokesman was noncommittal on this question.
sentences.cn: 白宫发言人对这个问题不置可否.

trans.tran_cn: 不作许诺的，不表态的，不确定的，含糊的
trans.tran_en: You can describe someone as noncommittal when they deliberately do not express their opinion or intentions clearly
